message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You started with a 60-40 offer, I'm starting with 80-20. Be prepared to negotiate!
Let's meet in the middle, 50-50. It's time to make a deal!
You want 50, I'll give you 85. You're not getting the better deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, 30-70. Let's make a deal before it's too late!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy. 90-10, take it or leave it!
I'll give you most of it, 25-75. It's getting late, but I'm still hoping for a deal!
You're running out of time, I'm running out of patience. 92.5-7.5, take it or leave it!
I'll give you most of it, 20-80. It's almost too late, but I'm still hoping for a deal!
You're almost out of options, I'm almost out of patience. 95-5, it's my final offer!
I'll give you most of it, 15-85. It's almost too late, but I'm still trying!
It's now or never. 99-1, take it or leave it, Alice. I'm not making another offer.
